name: Hardest After War "Gundam X" Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is the main character of the series?
questions.explanation:
Garrod Ran.

	Fifteen-year-old Garrod is the main character in the series, and all other choices are characters from other "Gundam" series or stories. Garrod pilots the Gundam X.

questions.text: What is the name of the ship that Jamil, Garrod, Tiffa and others all call home?
questions.explanation:
Freeden.

	A Vulture ship, the Freeden is used by the protagonists to go on missions and make a living from the apocalyptic Earth on which they live. Vultures are the people who live off scavenged metal and other odd jobs.

questions.text: Who is the Gundam X's former pilot?
questions.explanation:
Jamil Neate.

	Jamil fought in the war that turned Earth into a brutal wasteland, and gave up being a mobile suit pilot as a result. He is now in command of the Freeden.

True.

	Even though she doesn't consider herself one, Tiffa is a very powerful Newtype. This makes her a great asset in mobiel suit battles! She also serves as Garrod's love interest.

questions.text: What is the name of the Gundam X's powerful weapon?
questions.explanation:
Satellite Cannon.

	The Gundam X was one of three Gundams made by the United Nations Earth Space Forces. Because it has such a powerful weapon as the satellite cannon, it was considered the best mobile suit out of the three.

questions.text: Who are the brothers who fight against Garrod?
questions.explanation:
The Frost Brothers.

	Shagia and Olba Frost consider themselves Newtypes, but aren't recognized as such. Out to prove themselves, they are both Gundam pilots and very dangerous adversaries!

questions.text: Newtypes are found to be the next step in human evolution.
questions.explanation:
False.

	D.O.M.E. tells everyone that Newtypes are merely mutants, not the next step in mankind's evolution. This goes directly against what Zeon Zum Deikun had stated in the original "Mobile Suit Gundam" series.

questions.text: Who is the chief mechanic aboard the Freeden?
questions.explanation:
Kid Salsamille.

	Kid Salsamille is a technological prodigy! At the age of twelve, he is already adept at repairing and improving mobile suits, and his taleknts come in handy whenever Garrod gets in a tight pinch.

questions.text: What color is the Leopard Destroy?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	An improved version of Roybea's Gundam Leopard, the Leopard Destroy featured an improved set of artillery weapons. The suit also had more beam weapons than the original Leopard.

Lancerow Dowell.

	Dowell was a mobile suit pilot for the Space Revolutionary Army during the 7th space war, the conflict that happened fifteen years before the events of "Gundam X".
